SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM , TAXM_SA01_JONG , TAXM_SB01_JONG , TAXM_SC01_JONG , TAXM_SD01_JONG , TAXM_SE01_JONG , TAXM_SE02_JONG , TAXM_SE10_JONG , TAXM_SF01_JONG , TAXM_SG01_JONG , TAXM_SH01_JONG , TAXM_SH02_JONG , TAXM_SH03_JONG , TAXM_SH04_JONG , TAXM_SH05_JONG , TAXM_SH06_JONG , TAXM_SH07_JONG , TAXM_SH08_JONG , TAXM_SH09_JONG , TAXM_SH10_JONG , TAXM_SH14_JONG , TAXM_SH15_JONG , TAXM_SH11_JONG , TAXM_SH12_JONG , TAXM_SH13_JONG , TAXM_SH16_JONG , TAXM_SI01_JONG , TAXM_SJ01_JONG , TAXM_SJ10_JONG , TAXM_SK01_JONG , TAXM_SL01_JONG , TAXM_SM01_JONG , TAXM_SM02_JONG , TAXM_SM03_JONG , TAXM_SN01_JONG , TAXM_SO01_JONG , TAXM_SP01_JONG , TAXM_SP02_JONG , TAXM_SQ01_JONG , TAXM_SR01_JONG , TAXM_SR10_JONG , TAXM_SS01_JONG , TAXM_SY02_JONG , TAXM_SY03_JONG , TAXM_SY04_JONG , TAXM_SY21_JONG , TAXM_SY22_JONG , TAXM_ST01_JONG , TAXM_ST10_JONG , TAXM_ST11_JONG , TAXM_ST12_JONG , TAXM_ST20_JONG , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE160405 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , WHDG_DEBR_BUSOPR_RGSTNUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE160405 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE160405 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
